name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SAP Enable Now, browser application recorder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to create help content for web-based applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to create help content for web-based applications.

This extension provides the use case along with SAP Enable Now to use the web-based recording mode from within the SAP Enable Now Manager (minimum version 2211).
